items.title: Risotto raises $10M seed to use AI to make ticketing systems easier to use
items.description: Designed to autonomously resolve help desk tickets, Risotto has raised $10 million in seed funding in a round led by Bonfire Ventures.

items.title: Samsung’s TriFold phone will cost $2,899 in the US
items.description: The phone's display unfolds twice to reveal a 10-inch display, which is the largest screen ever on a Galaxy phone.

items.title: Airtable gets into the AI agent game with Superagent
items.description: SuperAgent is Airtable's first standalone product in its 13-year history, and signals both the company's ambitions and the reality of the current AI m...

items.title: Phoebe Gates and Sophia Kianni’s Phia raises $35M to ‘make shopping fun again’
items.description: “We’re on the cusp of a completely new way of shopping,” Gates told TechCrunch.

items.title: Pinterest to lay off 15% of staff to redirect resources to AI
items.description: Pinterest says it's "reallocating resources to AI-focused roles and teams that drive AI adoption and execution" and "prioritizing AI‑powered products ...
